name: m
description: A data oriented programming language for developing games and interactive experiences

scripts.install:
printf "#!/bin/sh
npx cspell Documentation/**/*.md &&
npx markdownlint Documentation/**/*.md &&
find Documentation -exec npx write-good {} + &&
find Documentation -exec npx markdown-link-checker {} +" > .git/hooks/pre-commit && printf "package-lock.json
node_modules
.gitignore" > .gitignore && chmod +x .git/hooks/pre-commit
scripts.summary:
find Documentation/English | sort | sed -E "/\.[^ m][^ d]*$/d;/^\.$/d;/README/d;/SUMMARY/d;s/[^/]*\//  /g;s/\.md//g;s/[0-9]+\. //g;s/(\s*)(.*)/\1* [\2]/g;s/  //" > names && find Documentation/English | sort | sed "/\.[^m ][^d ]*$/d;/^\.$/d;/README/d;s/\([^.][^m][^d]\)$/\1\/README.md/g;/SUMMARY.md/d;s/ /%20/g;s/\(\s*\)\(.*\)/\1(\2)/g" > links && printf "# Summary

* [What is M](README.md)

" > SUMMARY.md && paste -d "" names links >> SUMMARY.md && rm names && rm links
